FuncDef: The reset nhrp peer command deletes dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the network layer protocol address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the network layer protocol mask.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command deletes dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries before the entries age out. This prevents the existing NHRP peer entries from affecting the diagnosis result.
Configuration Impact
Dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries are deleted from the local device and no entry will be generated before the peer device registers with the local device.
Precautions
Deleting dynamically negotiated NHRP peer entries may result in communication interruption.Run this command only on the mGRE interface.
